column13: GitHub Actions workflows, Docker images (suite), Documentation

Purpose: Single source of truth for all prompts in JSON/MDC format
Shared TypeScript interfaces and OpenAPI contracts for the ecosystem
Core domain logic and business rules (hexagonal architecture)
Artifacts: Core entities, Services, Ports, Use cases

Purpose: File-based storage adapter implementing core ports
MDC format parsing and serialization adapter
PostgreSQL storage adapter with advanced querying
In-memory storage adapter for testing and development
Artifacts: Memory adapter, Test utilities, Mock data

Purpose: Command-line interface adapter for MCP Prompts
REST API adapter for HTTP communication
Eta templating engine adapter for prompt rendering
MCP server application with composition root and transport layers
Artifacts: MCP server, HTTP transport, SSE support, Health checks
